front.title: DNSSEC Practice Statement for the Root Zone KSK Operator

author.organization: Internet Corporation For Assigned Names and Numbers

abstract.t: This document is the DNSSEC Practice Statement (DPS) for the Root Zone Key Signing Key (KSK) Operator. It states the practices and provisions that are used to provide Root Zone Key Signing and Key Distribution services. These include, but are not limited to: issuing, managing, changing and distributing DNS keys in accordance with the specific requirements of the U.S. Department of Commerce.
